CustomField.description: When certain Ascend functions try to delete multiple Opportunities at once, they may attempt the deletion as a batch job instead of an immediate deletion. If the number of Opportunities is equal to or greater than the Batch Threshold defined here, then a batch job will be fired.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When certain Ascend functions try to delete multiple Opportunities at once, they may attempt the deletion as a batch job instead of an immediate deletion. This setting controls the threshold at which that happens.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Deletion Batch Threshold
